text: {{Infobox settlement | name = District of Lisbon | native_name = | native_name_lang = pt | settlement_type = District | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_flag = Bandeira municipal de Lisboa.png | image_seal = | image_shield = Crest of Lisboa.png | image_map = LocalDistritoLisboa.svg | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Portugal | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Lisbon (partly Alentejo Region) | subdivision_type2 = Historical province | subdivision_name2 = Estremadura Province (partly Ribatejo Province) | subdivision_type3 = No. of municipalities | subdivision_name3 = 16 | subdivision_type4 = No. of parishes | subdivision_name4 = 134 | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Lisbon | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2,800 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 2,135,992 | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = PT-11 | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = No. of parliamentary representatives | blank_info_sec1 = 48 }} The District of Lisbon () is along the western coast of Portugal. The district capital is the city of Lisbon, which is also the national capital. == Municipalities == The district has 16 municipalities: * Alenquer * Amadora * Arruda dos Vinhos * Azambuja * Cadaval * Cascais * Lisbon * Loures * Lourinhã * Mafra * Odivelas * Oeiras * Sintra * Sobral de Monte Agraço * Torres Vedras * Vila Franca de Xira
title: Lisbon District
